languages.text: "Мы... испытывали печаль от того, что не могли больше коммуницировать с тобой. И тревогу за твою судьбу".
"We felt sadness when we could no longer communicate with you. And we were worried about your fate."
languages.original_text: "Мы... испытывали печаль от того, что не могли больше коммуницировать с тобой. И тревогу за твою судьбу".

traits.locale_text: "We felt sadness when we could no longer communicate with you. And we were worried about your fate."
"We felt sadness when we could no longer communicate with you. And we were worried about your fate."
"We felt sadness when we could no longer communicate with you. And we were worried about your fate."
"We felt sadness when we could no longer communicate with you. And we were worried about your fate."
"We felt sadness when we could no longer communicate with you. And we were worried about your fate."

languages.text: 「あなたと交信できなくなって悲しかったです。そして我々はあなたの運命を心配していました」
languages.original_text: "We felt sadness when we could no longer communicate with you. And we were worried about your fate."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたと交信できなくなって悲しかったです。そして我々はあなたの運命を心配していました」

languages.text: “之前无法与你沟通的时候，我们难过不已。我们很担心你的命运。”
languages.original_text: "We felt sadness when we could no longer communicate with you. And we were worried about your fate."

traits.locale_text: “之前无法与你沟通的时候，我们难过不已。我们很担心你的命运。”

languages.text: "Wir haben Trauer empfunden, als wir nicht länger mit Euch kommunizieren konnten. Und wir waren besorgt um Euch."
languages.original_text: "We felt sadness when we could no longer communicate with you. And we were worried about your fate."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben Trauer empfunden, als wir nicht länger mit Euch kommunizieren konnten. Und wir waren besorgt um Euch."

languages.text: « Nous avons éprouvé de la tristesse lorsque nous ne pouvions plus communiquer avec vous, et nous nous sommes inquiétés de votre sort. »
languages.original_text: "We felt sadness when we could no longer communicate with you. And we were worried about your fate."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons éprouvé de la tristesse lorsque nous ne pouvions plus communiquer avec vous, et nous nous sommes inquiétés de votre sort. »

languages.text: «Sentimos pena cuando no pudimos comunicarnos con usted. Y nos preocupaba la suerte que había corrido».
languages.original_text: "We felt sadness when we could no longer communicate with you. And we were worried about your fate."

traits.locale_text: «Sentimos pena cuando no pudimos comunicarnos con usted. Y nos preocupaba la suerte que había corrido».

languages.text: "Sizinle iletişimimiz koptuğunda üzüntü hissettik. Akıbetiniz hakkında da endişelendik."
languages.original_text: "We felt sadness when we could no longer communicate with you. And we were worried about your fate."

traits.locale_text: "Sizinle iletişimimiz koptuğunda üzüntü hissettik. Akıbetiniz hakkında da endişelendik."
